subject: Sports Injuries
Football
lead_paragraph: The Jets, who mustered little offense in a 34-0 loss to the 49ers on Sunday, have been hobbled by a serious left-foot injury to their top receiver, Santonio Holmes.
snippet: The Jets, who mustered little offense in a 34-0 loss to the 49ers on Sunday, have been hobbled by a serious left-foot injury to their top receiver, Santonio Holmes.
